chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p q r s : list (Term A n)), reduceplus Q p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> eqP A eqA n p r -> eqP A eqA n q s -> reduceplus Q r s

Premises:

```coq
intros Q p q r s.
intros H1 H2 H3 H4.
apply (reduce_mults_inv_lem A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r q) in H2.
destruct H2 as [x [a [H5 [H6 H7]]]].
apply (irreducible_eqp_com A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q) in H7.
apply (eqp_pluspf_com A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q r s) in H3.
apply (reduce_inv2 A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q p) in H4.
destruct H4 as [y [b [H8 [H9 H10]]]].
apply (eqp_spminusf_com A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p r) in H5.
apply (eqp_spminusf_com A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb q r) in H9.
apply (canonical_reduce A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec q) in H2.
apply (ltP_reduce A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec q p) in H10.
apply (Rstar_n Q x y r s).
apply (reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x y).
apply (reduce_mults A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a p).
apply (reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q y q).
apply (Rstar_0 Q r s).
apply H3.
Qed.

original: intros Q p q r s. intros H1 H2 H3 H4. apply (reduce_mults_inv_lem A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q r q) in H2. destruct H2 as [x [a [H5 [H6 H7]]]]. apply (irreducible_eqp_com A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q) in H7. apply (eqp_pluspf_com A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q r s) in H3. apply (reduce_inv2 A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q p) in H4. destruct H4 as [y [b [H8 [H9 H10]]]]. apply (eqp_spminusf_com A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb p r) in H5. apply (eqp_spminusf_com A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZb q r) in H9. apply (canonical_reduce A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec q) in H2. apply (ltP_reduce A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec q p) in H10. apply (Rstar_n Q x y r s). apply (reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x y). apply (reduce_mults A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a p). apply (reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q y q). apply (Rstar_0 Q r s). apply H3.
